name: Rumtek Monastery
description: The largest monastery in Sikkim, it is the center of the Kagyu lineage and features stunning Tibetan architecture. Perfect for history and spiritual travelers.

name: Pemayangtse Monastery
description: One of the oldest and most important monasteries in Sikkim, known for its intricate wooden sculpture of Guru Padmasambhava’s heavenly palace. Ideal for art and history lovers.

name: Enchey Monastery
description: A popular monastery in Gangtok, known for its serene atmosphere and traditional masked dances.

name: Tashiding Monastery
description: Considered the most sacred monastery in Sikkim, it's famous for its holy stupa and the annual Bumchu festival.
